In ibc_test_framework::types::env

Trait ibc_test_framework::types::env::ExportEnv

source · [−]
pub trait ExportEnv {
    fn export_env(&self, writer: &mut impl EnvWriter);
}
Expand description

This trait is implemented by data types that can export the contained information as environment variables.

Using this, test framework can export them as .env files, which users can then manually source them in the terminal to interact with the test chains and relayer when the tests are suspended.

Required methods

source

fn export_env(&self, writer: &mut impl EnvWriter)

Export the environment variables using the given EnvWriter.
